verses.verse: Hear, <S%H8085><s%> O Israel: <S%H3478><s%> Thou <S%H859><s%> art to pass over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H853><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%> this day, <S%H3117><s%> to go in <S%H935><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> greater <S%H1419><s%> and mightier <S%H6099><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> thyself, cities <S%H5892><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> and fenced up <S%H1219><s%> to heaven, <S%H8064><s%>

A people <S%H5971><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> and tall, <S%H7311><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of the Anakims, <S%H6062><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> knowest, <S%H3045><s%> and of whom thou <S%H859><s%> hast heard <S%H8085><s%> say, Who <S%H4310><s%> can stand <S%H3320><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Anak! <S%H6061><s%>

Understand <S%H3045><s%> therefore this day, <S%H3117><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> is he <S%H1931><s%> which goeth over <S%H5674><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee; as a consuming <S%H398><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> shall destroy <S%H8045><s%> them, and he <S%H1931><s%> shall bring them down <S%H3665><s%> before thy face: <S%H6440><s%> so shalt thou drive them out, <S%H3423><s%> and destroy <S%H6><s%> them quickly, <S%H4118><s%> as <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath said <S%H1696><s%> unto thee.

Speak <S%H559><s%> not <S%H408><s%> thou in thine heart, <S%H3824><s%> after that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> hath cast them out <S%H1920><s%> <S%H853><s%> from before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> thee, saying, <S%H559><s%> For my righteousness <S%H6666><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath brought me in <S%H935><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> <S%H853><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> land: <S%H776><s%> but for the wickedness <S%H7564><s%> of these <S%H428><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> doth drive them out <S%H3423><s%> from before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> thee.

Not <S%H3808><s%> for thy righteousness, <S%H6666><s%> or for the uprightness <S%H3476><s%> of thine heart, <S%H3824><s%> dost thou <S%H859><s%> go <S%H935><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> <S%H853><s%> their land: <S%H776><s%> but <S%H3588><s%> for the wickedness <S%H7564><s%> of these <S%H428><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> doth drive them out <S%H3423><s%> from before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> thee, and that <S%H4616><s%> he may perform <S%H6965><s%> <S%H853><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> swore <S%H7650><s%> unto thy fathers, <S%H1><s%> Abraham, <S%H85><s%> Isaac, <S%H3327><s%> and Jacob. <S%H3290><s%>

Understand <S%H3045><s%> therefore, that <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> giveth <S%H5414><s%> thee not <S%H3808><s%> <S%H853><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> land <S%H776><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> it for thy righteousness; <S%H6666><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> art a stiffnecked <S%H7186><s%> <S%H6203><s%> people. <S%H5971><s%>

Remember, <S%H2142><s%> and forget <S%H7911><s%> not, <S%H408><s%> <S%H853><s%> how <S%H834><s%> thou provokedst <S%H7107><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> to wrath in the wilderness: <S%H4057><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> that <S%H834><s%> thou didst depart <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H4480><s%> <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> ye came <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> place, <S%H4725><s%> ye have been <S%H1961><s%> rebellious <S%H4784><s%> against <S%H5973><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
Also in Horeb <S%H2722><s%> ye provoked <S%H7107><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> to wrath, so that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was angry <S%H599><s%> with you to have destroyed <S%H8045><s%> you.

When I was gone up <S%H5927><s%> into the mount <S%H2022><s%> to receive <S%H3947><s%> the tables <S%H3871><s%> of stone, <S%H68><s%> even the tables <S%H3871><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> made <S%H3772><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> you, then I abode <S%H3427><s%> in the mount <S%H2022><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> and forty <S%H705><s%> nights, <S%H3915><s%> I neither <S%H3808><s%> did eat <S%H398><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> drink <S%H8354><s%> water: <S%H4325><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> delivered <S%H5414><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me <S%H853><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> tables <S%H3871><s%> of stone <S%H68><s%> written <S%H3789><s%> with the finger <S%H676><s%> of God; <S%H430><s%> and on <S%H5921><s%> them was written according to all <S%H3605><s%> the words, <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> you in the mount <S%H2022><s%> out of the midst <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8432><s%> of the fire <S%H784><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of the assembly. <S%H6951><s%>

And it came to pass <S%H1961><s%> at the end <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7093><s%> of forty <S%H705><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> and forty <S%H705><s%> nights, <S%H3915><s%> that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> <S%H413><s%> me <S%H853><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> tables <S%H3871><s%> of stone, <S%H68><s%> even the tables <S%H3871><s%> of the covenant. <S%H1285><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, Arise, <S%H6965><s%> get thee down <S%H3381><s%> quickly <S%H4118><s%> from hence; <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2088><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> thy people <S%H5971><s%> which <S%H834><s%> thou hast brought forth <S%H3318><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4714><s%> have corrupted <S%H7843><s%> themselves; they are quickly <S%H4118><s%> turned aside <S%H5493><s%> out of <S%H4480><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I commanded <S%H6680><s%> them; they have made <S%H6213><s%> them a molten image. <S%H4541><s%>

Furthermore the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, saying, <S%H559><s%> I have seen <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> is a stiffnecked <S%H7186><s%> <S%H6203><s%> people: <S%H5971><s%>

Let me alone, <S%H7503><s%> <S%H4480><s%> that I may destroy <S%H8045><s%> them, and blot out <S%H4229><s%> <S%H853><s%> their name <S%H8034><s%> from under <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8478><s%> heaven: <S%H8064><s%> and I will make <S%H6213><s%> of thee a nation <S%H1471><s%> mightier <S%H6099><s%> and greater <S%H7227><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> they.

So I turned <S%H6437><s%> and came down <S%H3381><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> the mount, <S%H2022><s%> and the mount <S%H2022><s%> burned <S%H1197><s%> with fire: <S%H784><s%> and the two <S%H8147><s%> tables <S%H3871><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> were in <S%H5921><s%> my two <S%H8147><s%> hands. <S%H3027><s%>

And I looked, <S%H7200><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> ye had sinned <S%H2398><s%> against the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> and had made <S%H6213><s%> you a molten <S%H4541><s%> calf: <S%H5695><s%> ye had turned aside <S%H5493><s%> quickly <S%H4118><s%> out of <S%H4480><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> you.

And I took <S%H8610><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> tables, <S%H3871><s%> and cast <S%H7993><s%> them out of <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> my two <S%H8147><s%> hands, <S%H3027><s%> and broke <S%H7665><s%> them before your eyes. <S%H5869><s%>

And I fell down <S%H5307><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> as at the first, <S%H7223><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> and forty <S%H705><s%> nights: <S%H3915><s%> I did neither <S%H3808><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> bread, <S%H3899><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> drink <S%H8354><s%> water, <S%H4325><s%> because of <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> your sins <S%H2403><s%> which <S%H834><s%> ye sinned, <S%H2398><s%> in doing <S%H6213><s%> wickedly <S%H7451><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> to provoke him to anger. <S%H3707><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> I was afraid <S%H3025><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the anger <S%H639><s%> and hot displeasure, <S%H2534><s%> wherewith <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was wroth <S%H7107><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> you to destroy <S%H8045><s%> you. But the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hearkened <S%H8085><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me at that <S%H1931><s%> time <S%H6471><s%> also. <S%H1571><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was very angry <S%H599><s%> <S%H3966><s%> with Aaron <S%H175><s%> to have destroyed <S%H8045><s%> him: and I prayed <S%H6419><s%> for <S%H1157><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> the same <S%H1931><s%> time. <S%H6256><s%>

And I took <S%H3947><s%> your sin, <S%H2403><s%> <S%H853><s%> the calf <S%H5695><s%> which <S%H834><s%> ye had made, <S%H6213><s%> and burnt <S%H8313><s%> it with fire, <S%H784><s%> and stamped <S%H3807><s%> it, and ground <S%H2912><s%> it very small, <S%H3190><s%> even until <S%H5704><s%> it <S%H834><s%> was as small <S%H1854><s%> as dust: <S%H6083><s%> and I cast <S%H7993><s%> <S%H853><s%> the dust <S%H6083><s%> thereof into <S%H413><s%> the brook <S%H5158><s%> that descended <S%H3381><s%> out of <S%H4480><s%> the mount. <S%H2022><s%>
And at Taberah, <S%H8404><s%> and at Massah, <S%H4532><s%> and at Kibroth-hattaavah, <S%H6914><s%> ye provoked <S%H7107><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> to wrath.

Likewise when the LORD <S%H3068><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> you from Kadesh-barnea, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6947><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Go up <S%H5927><s%> and possess <S%H3423><s%> <S%H853><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I have given <S%H5414><s%> you; then ye rebelled against <S%H4784><s%> <S%H853><s%> the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> and ye believed <S%H539><s%> him not, <S%H3808><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> hearkened <S%H8085><s%> to his voice. <S%H6963><s%>
Ye have been <S%H1961><s%> rebellious <S%H4784><s%> against <S%H5973><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> from the day <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3117><s%> that I knew <S%H3045><s%> you.

Thus I fell down <S%H5307><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> <S%H853><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> and forty <S%H705><s%> nights, <S%H3915><s%> as <S%H834><s%> I fell down <S%H5307><s%> at the first; because <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had said <S%H559><s%> he would destroy <S%H8045><s%> you.

I prayed <S%H6419><s%> therefore unto <S%H413><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> O Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD, <S%H3069><s%> destroy <S%H7843><s%> not <S%H408><s%> thy people <S%H5971><s%> and thine inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> which <S%H834><s%> thou hast redeemed <S%H6299><s%> through thy greatness, <S%H1433><s%> which <S%H834><s%> thou hast brought forth <S%H3318><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4714><s%> with a mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand. <S%H3027><s%>

Remember <S%H2142><s%> thy servants, <S%H5650><s%> Abraham, <S%H85><s%> Isaac, <S%H3327><s%> and Jacob; <S%H3290><s%> look <S%H6437><s%> not <S%H408><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the stubbornness <S%H7190><s%> of this <S%H2088><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> nor to <S%H413><s%> their wickedness, <S%H7562><s%> nor to <S%H413><s%> their sin: <S%H2403><s%>

Lest <S%H6435><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> whence <S%H834><s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8034><s%> thou broughtest us out <S%H3318><s%> say, <S%H559><s%> Because the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was not able <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1097><s%> <S%H3201><s%> to bring <S%H935><s%> them into <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he promised <S%H1696><s%> them, and because he hated <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8135><s%> them, he hath brought them out <S%H3318><s%> to slay <S%H4191><s%> them in the wilderness. <S%H4057><s%>

Yet they <S%H1992><s%> are thy people <S%H5971><s%> and thine inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> which <S%H834><s%> thou broughtest out <S%H3318><s%> by thy mighty <S%H1419><s%> power <S%H3581><s%> and by thy stretched out <S%H5186><s%> arm. <S%H2220><s%>
